name: Fast Food Fun Run
description:
Fast Food is a fun, easy to play addictive game.

Although it is easy to play Fast Food, it requires skillful fingers to master this game.

Touch and hold the screen as long as you can. Don’t lift your finger or hit any food.

Set your best score to see how good you are, unlock achievements, have lots of fun and avoid Fast Food, although it is delicious.

Game Features:
- One - Touch Controls
- Always different level
- Fun music and graphics
- No In App Purchases
